trans-unit.source: The test %s was skipped because other tests failed or were skipped.
Following dependencies failed: %s
Following dependencies skipped: %s
The configuration could be loaded.
The configuration could not be loaded.
The configuration file is well formated and holds all required options.
The configuration file is missing required options.
These configuration values are missing: %s
The configuration file contains unused options.
These configuration options are not used: %s
Some options to not match the expected variable type.
Following options do not respect the format: %s
These tables are missing: %s
The local database is accessible and contains all required tables.
The local database is inaccessible.
The local database seems to be offline.
The local database misses important tables.
The foreign database is accessible and contains all required tables.
The foreign database is inaccessible.
The foreign database seems to be offline.
The foreign database misses important tables.
The local database is the same as the foreign database.
The schema of the local and foreign database is identical.
The databases have different tables.
Following tables only exist on local: %sFollowing tables only exist on foreign: %s
Field differences between your databases have been detected.
These fields differ: %s
All required and optional PHP SSH2 functions are available.
PHP SSH functions are missing. Install the PHP ssh2 library.
The function "ssh2_sftp_chmod" is missing. Permissions will be set on CLI level, but will not report any error!
The function "ssh2_sftp_chmod" is available since php_ssh2 0.12. Either upgrade or ignore this message.
The SSH connection to the foreign host was successful and all options are correct.
The SSH connection to the foreign host failed.
The following error was returned by the ssh connection: "%s"
The path to php seems to be wrong (option: sshConnection.pathToPhp).
The test returned following error message: %s
The foreign document root could not be validated, because typical TYPO3 folders are missing (option: sshConnection.foreignRootPath).
Could not validate the foreign document root for other reasons.
The command returned following message: %s
UTF8 file and folder names will break the publishing process, because special UTF8 characters are detected as malicious on the CLI.
The local environment was validated successfully.
No valid sys_domain entry has been be found on the local system.
UTF8 filesystem configured for the local system, please disable this configuration in Install tool.
Some tables in "excludeRelatedTables" do not exist in the local database.
Following tables are configured but do not exist: %s
The foreign environment was validated successfully.
No valid sys_domain entry has been be found on the foreign system.
Could not call the CLI dispatcher on foreign because the backend user "_cli_lowlevel" is missing there.
The call to the dispatcher returned following error: %s
Could not call the CLI dispatcher on foreign because of an unexpected error.
The call to the dispatcher returned following message: %s
The installed versions on the local and foreign system are different.
Local version: %s. Foreign Version: %s
The configuration could not be loaded on the foreign system.
The confguration utility has following loading state: "%s"
UTF8 filesystem configured for the foreign system, please disable this configuration in Install tool.
The TYPO3 versions of the local and the foreign instance differ.
Local TYPO3 Version: %s. Foreign TYPO3 Version: %s.
